name: IllusionoisullI
description:
IllusionoisullI is created by Unity, and it is a visual novel that tells a story about when the protagonist is trapped into a time loop, and he went into a spiritual world after a lethal car accident. In the spiritual world, the protagonist first met Karen, who had been waiting for him for a while. However, he couldn’t figure out what was happening. After a couple hours of hanging out with Karen, he starts to realize what happened to him, and he needs to figure out a way to escape the spiritual world and break the time loop…

Players are standing on the protagonist’s viewpoint to go over the entire story. During the game, players can help the protagonist to decide what to do. Also, players should remember some significant information during the game, because that information may change the entire game’s ending. It is okay that the player might not know some key information to solve the puzzle, that is because they are not there yet.
